name: Unknightly
description: Unknightly is a medieval VR stealth game designed from the ground up for virtual reality. You play the role of a former member of the "Knight's Order". You have been banished from the kingdom never to return again, on the charge of "Unknightly" behavior.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-6500 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Vega 56 or greater DirectX: Version 11
